title: Possible devastating situation averted due to COVID vaccination rollout- President
content: A possible catastrophic situation that could be emerged in the country has been brought under control by implementing COVID-19 vaccination programme, President Gotabaya Rajapaksa said.The President made these remarks addressing the High-Level Thematic Debate on 'Galvanising Momentum for Universal Vaccination' held at the General Assembly Hall, United Nations Headquarters, yesterday (25), via video link.
